statements: SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, current_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE id = 1;
SELECT indicator_name, change_percent FROM economic_indicators WHERE current_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT indicator_name, current_value, change_percent FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY indicator_name;
SELECT id, indicator_name, current_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE change_percent > 5.0 ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT indicator_name, change_percent, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_last_updated FROM economic_indicators WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT AVG(current_value) AS avg_value, MAX(change_percent) AS max_change FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_name LIKE '%GDP%' AND current_value BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions WHERE assets > liabilities;
SELECT institution_name, liabilities FROM financial_institutions ORDER BY liabilities DESC;
SELECT id, indicator_name FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value < 50;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_name = 'GDP';
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100000 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_institutions WHERE assets > liabilities AND assets > 1000000 ORDER BY assets DESC;
SELECT institution_name, SUM(assets) AS total_assets FROM financial_institutions GROUP BY institution_name HAVING total_assets > 5000000 ORDER BY total_assets DESC;

SELECT E.indicator_name, F.institution_name FROM economic_indicators E INNER JOIN financial_institutions F ON E.id = F.id WHERE F.assets > F.liabilities ORDER BY E.indicator_name ASC, F.institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY indicator_name ASC;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 100000 ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT data_source, COUNT(*) AS total_indicators FROM economic_indicators GROUP BY data_source;
SELECT * FROM investment_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Buy' AND amount_invested >= 100000 ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT institution_name, industry_sector, location FROM financial_institutions WHERE industry_sector = 'Banking' ORDER BY institution_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 1000 ORDER BY indicator_name DESC;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value, data_source FROM economic_indicators WHERE data_source = 'Government' OR data_source = 'Private' ORDER BY indicator_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM investment_decisions WHERE amount_invested BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM financial_institutions WHERE industry_sector = 'Banking' ORDER BY institution_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM economic_indicators INNER JOIN investment_decisions ON economic_indicators.id = investment_decisions.id WHERE indicator_value > 500 AND decision_type = 'Investment' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, value FROM economic_indicators WHERE value > 100;
SELECT investor_name, location FROM investors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT investment_name, amount, date FROM investments WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators WHERE value > 100000 ORDER BY indicator_name ASC;
SELECT indicator_name, value FROM economic_indicators WHERE value < 50000 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM investors ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT investment_name, amount, date FROM investments WHERE amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT i.investment_name, t.amount, t.transaction_date, iv.investor_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN investments i ON t.investment_id = i.investment_id INNER JOIN investors iv ON t.investor_id = iv.investor_id WHERE t.amount > 10000 AND iv.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM economic_indicators;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_value FROM economic_indicators ORDER BY indicator_value DESC;
SELECT client_name, total_assets FROM clients WHERE client_type='High Net Worth';
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios WHERE portfolio_value > 1000000;
SELECT firm_name, founding_date, headquarters_location FROM investment_firms ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_firms;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_category FROM economic_indicators WHERE indicator_value > 1000 ORDER BY indicator_name DESC;
SELECT client_name, total_assets FROM clients WHERE total_assets BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 AND client_type = 'Individual' ORDER BY total_assets ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios WHERE portfolio_value < 50000 AND client_id IN (SELECT client_id FROM clients WHERE client_type = 'Corporate');
SELECT * FROM investment_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Buy' AND decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
